## OrganizationalItem.contentSecurityDescriptor property

Security Descriptor which specifies the Rights and Permissions that the current user has on the content of this Organizational Item.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get contentSecurityDescriptor(): SecurityDescriptor | undefined;
```
